results.name: a(1) = 0, and for n > 1, if A079559(n) = 0, a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A256992(n)), otherwise a(n) = 2*a(A256992(n)).
comment: Note the indexing: the domain starts from 1, while the range includes also zero.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 0, and for n > 1, if A079559(n) = 0 [when n is a term of A055938], a(n) = 1 + 2*a(A256992(n)), otherwise a(n) = 2*a(A256992(n)).
As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Related or similar permutations: A054429, A156552, A279338, A279341, A279347.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 10 2016
